alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 1:45PM CST until December 25 at 9:40PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Some low water crossings inundated with cattle and grazing and low water areas under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 30.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.1 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
